message.content:
cs.CL, cs.CR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IT

Reasoning: 
1. cs.CL (Computation and Language) - This paper focuses on using a statistical language model to generate steganographic text, which falls under the scope of natural language processing (NLP) and computational linguistics. 
2. cs.CR (Cryptography and Security) - Steganography is a technique used for information security and falls under the scope of cryptography and security. 
3. cs.LG (Machine Learning) - The proposed method uses machine learning techniques such as the Markov chain model to generate steganographic text. 
4. cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) - The use of machine learning techniques and the generation of fluent text carrier can be considered as an application of artificial intelligence. 
5. cs.IT (Information Theory) - The paper discusses the information imperceptibility and information hidden capacity of the proposed model, which falls under the scope of information theory.
